trans-unit.source: Uses of reverse proxies with <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Uses of reverse proxies with <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Utilisation d’un proxy inversé avec <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: Reverse Proxies are a type of intermediary servers retrieving resources from corporate network located servers to clients outside this corporate network. Like most corporate servers, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server usually stands behind a firewall for security reasons, preventing access from the Internet.

seg-source.mrk: Reverse Proxies are a type of intermediary servers retrieving resources from corporate network located servers to clients outside this corporate network.

Like most corporate servers, <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server usually stands behind a firewall for security reasons, preventing access from the Internet.

target.mrk: Les proxys inversés servent d'intermédiaires entre les serveurs situés sur le réseau d'entreprise et les agents en dehors de ce réseau d'entreprise qui veulent communiquer avec le serveur.

Tout comme la plupart des serveurs d’entreprise, le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est situé derrière un pare-feu pour des raisons de sécurité, empêchant l'accès à partir d'internet.

trans-unit.source: Yet, remote users need to access <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backup and restore services. Using a Reverse Proxy gives you the opportunity to remotely and transparently access <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> services over the Internet.

seg-source.mrk: Yet, remote users need to access <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backup and restore services.

Using a Reverse Proxy gives you the opportunity to remotely and transparently access <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> services over the Internet.

target.mrk: Cependant, les utilisateurs distants ont besoin d’accéder aux services de sauvegarde et de restauration <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

Utiliser un proxy inversé vous permet de vous connecter au service <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> à distance via Internet de façon transparente.
